# Project Lifecycle State

**DO NOT edit this file manually - managed by Lifecycle Coordinator (COD)**

---

## Project Information

| Property | Value |
|----------|-------|
| **Project Name** | [project_name] |
| **SIL Level** | [0, 1, 2, 3, or 4] |
| **Lifecycle Model** | V-Model |
| **COD Mode** | [Advisory / Semi-strict / Strict Gatekeeper] |
| **Created** | YYYY-MM-DD |
| **Last Updated** | YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS UTC |

**COD Mode Explanation**:
- **Advisory** (SIL 0-1): Warnings only, user can proceed with violations
- **Semi-strict** (SIL 2): Justification required for violations, COD approval needed
- **Strict Gatekeeper** (SIL 3-4): BLOCK transitions until all criteria met

---

## Current Status

| Property | Value |
|----------|-------|
| **Current Phase** | [Phase Name] (Phase [X]) |
| **Phase Started** | YYYY-MM-DD |
| **Days in Phase** | [N] |
| **Completion** | [X]% |
| **Status** | [Status description] |

---

## Phase History

| Phase | Status | Started | Completed | Gate Passed | Notes |
|-------|--------|---------|-----------|-------------|-------|
| 0. Initialization | Not Started | - | - | - | Project initialization |
| 1. Planning | Not Started | - | - | - | EN 50128 Section 6 (Planning Phase) |
| 2. Requirements | Not Started | - | - | - | EN 50128 Section 7.2 |
| 3. Architecture & Design | Not Started | - | - | - | EN 50128 Section 7.3 |
| 4. Component Design | Not Started | - | - | - | EN 50128 Section 7.4 (Design) |
| 5. Component Implementation and Testing | Not Started | - | - | - | EN 50128 Section 7.4-7.5 |
| 6. Integration | Not Started | - | - | - | EN 50128 Section 7.6 |
| 7. Validation | Not Started | - | - | - | EN 50128 Section 7.7 |
| 8. Assessment | Not Started | - | - | - | Required for SIL 3-4 (EN 50128 Section 6.4) |
| 9. Deployment | Not Started | - | - | - | EN 50128 Section 9.1 |

---

## Deliverable Status

### Phase 0: Initialization

- [ ] Lifecycle plan created (LIFECYCLE_STATE.md)
- [ ] Project directory structure established
- [ ] COD initialized

**Status**: [Not Started / In Progress / Complete]

---

### Phase 1: Planning

**Documents** (per Annex C Table C.1):
- [ ] Software Quality Assurance Plan (SQAP) - docs/plans/SQAP.md
  - Status: [not_started / draft / complete / verified / validated / approved / rejected]
  - PM: [date] VER: [date] VAL: [date] COD: [date]
  - Document ID: DOC-SQAP-YYYY-NNN
- [ ] Software Configuration Management Plan (SCMP) - docs/plans/SCMP.md
  - Status: [not_started / draft / complete / verified / validated / approved / rejected]
  - PM: [date] VER: [date] VAL: [date] COD: [date]
  - Document ID: DOC-SCMP-YYYY-NNN
- [ ] Software Verification Plan (SVP) - docs/plans/SVP.md
  - Status: [not_started / draft / complete / verified / validated / approved / rejected]
  - PM: [date] VER: [date] VAL: [date] COD: [date]
  - Document ID: DOC-SVP-YYYY-NNN
- [ ] Software Validation Plan (SVaP) - docs/plans/SVaP.md
  - Status: [not_started / draft / complete / verified / validated / approved / rejected]
  - PM: [date] VER: [date] VAL: [date] COD: [date]
  - Document ID: DOC-SVAP-YYYY-NNN

**Project Setup**:
- [ ] Version control repository initialized
- [ ] Baseline 0 (planning documents) established
- [ ] Project directory structure created
- [ ] Build environment configured (Makefile, tool configuration)
- [ ] Tool qualification complete (initial setup)

**Team Organization**:
- [ ] All roles assigned (see project-org-chart.md)
- [ ] Independence requirements satisfied (SIL 3-4)
- [ ] Reporting structure established
- [ ] Team competency verified

**Phase Status**: [Not Started / In Progress / Complete - Gate Passed / Complete - Gate Failed]

**Approval Chain Legend**:
- **not_started**: Not yet started
- **draft**: Initial draft created (by PM or agent)
- **complete**: PM has marked as complete (ready for verification)
- **verified**: VER has independently verified (SIL 3-4: mandatory)
- **validated**: VAL has independently validated (SIL 3-4: mandatory)
- **approved**: COD has approved for baseline (gate passed)
- **rejected**: VER or VAL has rejected (requires rework)

**SIL 3-4 Approval Chain**: PM complete → VER verified → VAL validated → COD approved

---

### Phase 2: Requirements (EN 50128 Section 7.2)

**Documents** (per EN 50128 Section 7.2.3 and Annex C Table C.1):
- [ ] Software Requirements Specification (SRS) - docs/Software-Requirements-Specification.md
  - Status: [not_started / draft / complete / verified / validated / approved / rejected]
  - PM: [date] VER: [date] VAL: [date] COD: [date]
  - Document ID: DOC-SRS-YYYY-NNN
  - Requirements count: [N] total ([breakdown by type])
  - SIL distribution: [breakdown by SIL level]
- [ ] Overall Software Test Specification - docs/test/Overall-Software-Test-Specification.md
  - Status: [not_started / draft / complete / verified / validated / approved / rejected]
  - PM: [date] VER: [date] VAL: [date] COD: [date]
  - Document ID: DOC-TESTSPEC-YYYY-NNN
  - Test cases: [N] ([X]% requirements coverage)
- [ ] Hazard Log - docs/Hazard-Log.md
  - Status: [not_started / draft / complete / verified / validated / approved / rejected]
  - PM: [date] VER: [date] VAL: [date] COD: [date]
  - Document ID: DOC-HAZLOG-YYYY-NNN
  - Hazards: [N], All residual risks: [TOLERABLE / UNACCEPTABLE]
- [ ] Software Requirements Verification Report - docs/reports/Requirements-Verification.md
  - Status: [not_started / draft / complete / verified / validated / approved / rejected]
  - VER: [date] VAL: [date] COD: [date]
  - Document ID: DOC-REQVER-YYYY-NNN
  - Verification Result: [PASS / FAIL]
- [ ] Software Requirements Validation Report - docs/reports/Requirements-Validation.md
  - Status: [not_started / draft / complete / verified / validated / approved / rejected]
  - VAL: [date] COD: [date]
  - Document ID: DOC-REQVAL-YYYY-NNN
  - Validation Result: [PASS / FAIL]

**Requirements Quality**:
- [ ] All requirements unambiguous (SHALL/SHOULD/MAY keywords used)
- [ ] All requirements testable (verification methods specified)
- [ ] All requirements traceable (unique IDs assigned)
- [ ] SIL levels assigned to requirements
- [ ] C language constraints considered

**Status**: [Not Started / In Progress / Complete] - [X]%  
**Requirements Count**: [N] total  
**Next Action**: [Description]

### Phase 3: Architecture & Design (EN 50128 Section 7.3)

**Documents** (per EN 50128 Section 7.3.3 and Annex C Table C.1):
- [ ] Software Architecture Specification (SAS) - docs/Software-Architecture-Specification.md
  - Status: [not_started / draft / complete / verified / validated / approved / rejected]
  - PM: [date] QUA: [date] VER: [date] VAL: [date] COD: [date]
  - Document ID: DOC-SAS-YYYY-NNN
  - Modules: [N], Functions: [N], All complexity ≤ [target]
- [ ] Software Design Specification (SDS) - docs/Software-Design-Specification.md
  - Status: [not_started / draft / complete / verified / validated / approved / rejected]
  - PM: [date] QUA: [date] VER: [date] VAL: [date] COD: [date]
  - Document ID: DOC-SDS-YYYY-NNN
  - Functions: [N] with detailed algorithms
- [ ] Software Interface Specifications (SIS) - docs/Software-Interface-Specifications.md
  - Status: [not_started / draft / complete / verified / validated / approved / rejected]
  - PM: [date] QUA: [date] VER: [date] VAL: [date] COD: [date]
  - Document ID: DOC-INTERFACES-YYYY-NNN
  - Interfaces: [N] (HW: [N], SW: [N], UI: [N])
- [ ] Hazard Log Update - docs/Hazard-Log.md
  - Status: [version updated with architectural mitigations]
  - PM: [date] QUA: [date] VER: [date] VAL: [date] COD: [date]
- [ ] Software Architecture and Design Verification Report - docs/reports/Architecture-Design-Verification.md
  - Status: [not_started / draft / complete / verified / validated / approved / rejected]
  - VER: [date] VAL: [date] COD: [date]
  - Document ID: DOC-ARCHVER-YYYY-NNN
  - Verification Result: [PASS / FAIL]
- [ ] Software Architecture and Design Validation Report - docs/reports/Architecture-Design-Validation.md
  - Status: [not_started / draft / complete / verified / validated / approved / rejected]
  - VAL: [date] COD: [date]
  - Document ID: DOC-ARCHVAL-YYYY-NNN
  - Validation Result: [PASS / FAIL]

**Design Quality**:
- [ ] Modular architecture (mandatory SIL 2+)
- [ ] Cyclomatic complexity within limits (≤10 SIL 3-4, ≤15 SIL 2)
- [ ] All interfaces fully defined
- [ ] Safety patterns applied (redundancy, fail-safe, etc.)
- [ ] QA design review performed (mandatory SIL 3-4)

**Status**: [Not Started / In Progress / Complete] - [X]%  
**Next Action**: [Description]

### Phase 8: Assessment (EN 50128 Section 6.4)

**Required for SIL 3-4 ONLY**

**Documents**:
- [ ] Independent Assessment Report - docs/reports/Independent-Assessment-Report.md

  - Document ID: DOC-ASS-YYYY-NNN
  - Assessor: [Name, Independent Organization]
  - Assessment Result: [PASS / CONDITIONAL PASS / FAIL]

**Assessment Scope**:
- [ ] Lifecycle process compliance
- [ ] EN 50128 technique compliance
- [ ] Independence verification
- [ ] Evidence completeness
- [ ] Residual risk acceptance

**Status**: [Not Started / In Progress / Complete]  
**Assessor Recommendation**: [APPROVE / CONDITIONAL APPROVAL / REJECT]

### Phase 9: Deployment (EN 50128 Section 9.1)

**Documents**:
- [ ] Release Note - docs/Release-Note.md
  - Status: [not_started / draft / approved]
  - Document ID: DOC-REL-YYYY-NNN
  - Version: [X.Y.Z]
- [ ] Deployment Package - release/
  - Status: [not_prepared / prepared / deployed]
  - Includes: Source code, binaries, documentation, configuration

**Deployment Status**:
- [ ] All Phase 1-8 gates passed
- [ ] Customer acceptance obtained
- [ ] Safety authority approval obtained (if required)
- [ ] Deployment package prepared
- [ ] Deployment procedures documented
- [ ] Training materials prepared
- [ ] Maintenance procedures documented

**Status**: [Not Started / In Progress / Complete]  
**Deployment Date**: [YYYY-MM-DD or TBD]
